item.source: goddd i wanna fuckin play Red Dead Redemption already

item.title: goddd i wanna fuckin play Red Dead Redemption already
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
I was exploring the mountains one day and got charged at by 2 wild boars, they killed me and I rolled down the mountainside. This game is win.
I just wish I could do something with all the herbs I collect, like you know, actually making something medicinal. Say if they hadn’t used Regen health, but used GTA 4 style health, where a hot-dog replenished a small amount of health for example, but instead you could brew up some herbal remedies that you could make out of the herbs you collected. It would only replenish a small amount of health but it would actually make the herbs serve a purpose. Or say if you got bitten by a rattlesnake you could make a potion to reduce the poison effects. Or it would be awesome if you could make some snakeskin boots from all the snakeskins you collect. It’s an awesome game but it’s the little things that they could have included that would’ve added some extra depth to an otherwise awesome game. Ah I’ll stop rambling now, just wishful thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: goddd i wanna fuckin play Red Dead Redemption already
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
Kisuke Moto:

One question: Will Red Dead Redemption be out for PC?

it’s not really sure - like it was with GTA IV. i think it’s like always with Rockstar-games: they’ll bring it out later with better GFX for the PC and don’t give us much information before the PC-release. but that’s just what i think because german PC-gamesmags are writing about it. but i will get it for 360, too - can’t wait for the PC-version and it looks far much better than GTA IV on the 360.
